column2: SELECT TOP #     s.specObjID, s.z, dbo.fCosmoAbsMag(g.modelMag_r-g.extinction_r,s.z) M_r, dbo.fCosmoDl(s.z) D_l , g.modelMag_r-g.extinction_r m_r        FROM Galaxy as g     INNER JOIN SpecObjAll s ON s.bestObjID = g.objID        WHERE  s.z > # AND s.z<# AND (s.primTarget & #) != # and (s.primTarget & #) = #    AND g.modelMag_r-g.extinction_r<#
